org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom

Class CDATANode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.AbstractFXGNode
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.CDATANode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFXGNode, IPreserveWhiteSpaceNode, ITextNode

    public class CDATANode
extends AbstractFXGNode
implements ITextNode
    A class to determine whether a node constitutes an CData in a text flow.
